subject: re: Publicly accessible JUnit 3.8.x Javadoc
msgSnippet: ... I m sure it s in the download of JUnit 3.8 on sourceforge. (although I didn t look there.) I did search online and found a mirror.  Looks accurate to me:
messageBody:
> I wanted to link my tests javadocs with JUnit 3.8.x javadocs
> using "link" parameter. I cannot find it. I found only javadocs > for 4.0.x line. Is is published somewhere?
I'm sure it's in the download of JUnit 3.8 on sourceforge. (although I
didn't look there.)

I did search online and found a mirror. Looks accurate to me:
http://api.dpml.net/junit/3.8.1/index.html
